attributes.title: Subramanya, the Master of Spiritual Alchemy Science
attributes.description:
It is the first of the 6-day Skanda Shasti Mahotsava, celebrating the conception of Subramanya, who manifested from the Third Eye of Sadashiva. 
“Subramanya is the Master of the Alchemy Science”, declares Paramahamsa Nithyananda upon delivering the extraordinary, Divine story of Subramanya’s alchemic manifestation. Subramanya is the Completion of Sadashiva: the bioenergy of Sadashiva, the biomemory of Adi Shakti and the muscle memory of Ma Ganga, who is the spiritual incubator, holding the immense energies together.  

Paramahamsa Nithyananda reveals how he was gifted the great Alchemy Science from Subramanya Himself after completing a 6-day fast, during the Skanda Shasti Mahotsava. The auspicious happening of Subramanya, at Bengaluru Aadheenam, is significant as Paramahamsa Nithyananda continues preparing the Spiritual Alchemy Products for Sadashivoham 2016. 
(October 31, 3016)

Jnananjana – One of the first Spiritual alchemy Products:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EPNjrjY9kHw"
